component.name: Exiter
component.script:
sub init() m.top.functionName = "go" end sub
sub go() DeviceInfo = CreateObject("roDeviceInfo") IPAddr = DeviceInfo.getIPAddrs() transfer = createObject("roUrlTransfer") for each item in IPAddr url = "http://" + IPAddr[item] + ":8060/keypress/Back" transfer.setUrl(url) transfer.PostFromString("") end for end sub
